posts.post_content:
Very rare 1905-06 postcard of the original home of the Philadelphia Athletics.  Made from famous park photo shown below.  Will also include the color version produced a couple years later.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/other/large/bw.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/other/large/bw%20back.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/other/large/color.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/other/large/color%20back.jpg[/IMG]

SOLD

[IMG]https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/8f/Columbia_Park_Philadelphia.jpg[/IMG]
(not included)

Will take it, Jeff.
Received your email regarding the other card. Will reply later today.
